B

branch(int) - Method in class net.leksi.io.BranchReader
Returns an array of count new branches BranchReader which can be read from the current position of the parent's BranchReader.
Branch(BranchReader.Root.Branch) - Constructor for class net.leksi.io.BranchReader.Root.Branch
Creates a branch with a parent if it is given
branch(int) - Method in class net.leksi.io.BranchReader.Root.Branch
 
branches - Variable in class net.leksi.io.BranchReader.Root
The list of all branches of the tree.
BranchReader - Class in net.leksi.io
The class BranchReader is for different consumers to independently read the same Reader.
BranchReader() - Constructor for class net.leksi.io.BranchReader
 
BranchReader.ChunkHolder - Class in net.leksi.io
The class ChunkHolder is an auxiliary class to support a singly linked list of data pieces read from the underlying Reader.
BranchReader.Root - Class in net.leksi.io
The class Root is an infrastructure holder for the tree of BranchReader objects.
BranchReader.Root.Branch - Class in net.leksi.io
The class Branch is a concrete implementation of the abstract BranchReader.
buffer - Variable in class net.leksi.io.BranchReader.ChunkHolder
The char array to contain the data chunk.
